name: Little Chaos
description:
One little  mistake happened during the  alchemist's experiment.  Now everyone in town turned into stones!

Good thing is that we still can save them by making some potions.

"WASD" to move.

"LMB" to shoot.

"E" to interact.(such as pick up item, use potion on villager, place item on  the spell circle.)

"X" to drop item.

"Space" to drink potion.

Each potion will give you different buff.

Lets' deal with this chaos once and for all.

Made for the 2020 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam.

((ps.  small tips:

Use 3 herbs and  2 water to make green potion.

The spell circle must have 5 item on it to make potion.
